title: Nyoro-n Churuya-san (Nyoron! Churuya-san)
synopsis: An anime adaptation of the 4-panel strip manga release: Nyoron Churuya-san. Based on Suzumiya Haruhi's energetic and 'always up to go' character, Tsuruya.
characters: ['Churuya', 'Ashakura, Ryouko', 'Suzumiya, Haruhi', 'Kyon', 'Nagato, Yuki', 'Asahina, Mikuru', 'Koizumi, Itsuki', 'Shamisen', 'Computer Research Society President']
voices: ['Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Kuwatani, Natsuko', 'Hirano, Aya', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Chihara, Minori', 'Gotou, Yuuko', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Kobushi, Nobuyuki']
staff: [['Takemoto, Yasuhiro', ['Director']], ['Tsuruoka, Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Kousaki, Satoru', ['Music']], ['Tanigawa, Nagaru', ['Original Creator']]]
